discord.title:
JOIN THE DISCORD TO REQUEST NEW
FEATURES!

header.slogan:
SECURE. SIMPLE.
COMPLETELY IN
YOUR CONTROL.
header.sub-slogan:
Introducing Vultisig :
A highly secure self-custodial multi-chain crypto vault with in-built two-factor authentication, and no tracking or registration requirements.
header.download-title: Now Available for iOS, Mac and Android:

items.title: Single-signature wallets are dangerous
items.description: Accidentally lose your phone? Upload your private keys to a phishing site? Download a trojan and drain your metamask? Forget your backup phrase? Get your iCloud hacked? One mistake and forever rekt.

items.title: Hardware wallets are clunky
items.description:
Small screens, small buttons, annoying interfaces. Complicated setup instructions, scary firmware updates and confusing transactions.
Why can’t it be better.

items.title: Multi-sig wallets are painful
items.description: Lose one key, lose it all. Multi-sig is the solution, but does not work natively. Different networks (ETH, BTC, SOL) have different multi-sig setups, making a single UX impossible. If only there was something that works.

segment-2.sub-title: Vultisig is the next evolution in crypto vaults

items.title: USE YOUR EXISTING DEVICES
items.description: Forget hardware - use your phone as a co-signer device! Large screens, excellent user experience - easily verify transactions. Camera, bluetooth, wifi, cellular, USBC, secure enclaves, biometrics - all there.

items.title: EVERYONE HAS THEM ALREADY
items.description: Everyone has a phone, laptop or tablet. They are fast and powerful. They have full encryption and security. They don’t look like crypto wallets! You don’t need anything else.

items.title: BUILT WITH MAGIC
items.description: Threshold signatures are the magic. The private key never exits. Vault-shares never hold funds. No single key is vulnerable. No seed phrases. And native to all crypto networks.

items.title: Vault Generation
items.description:
KeyGen time: 10 seconds.
2of2, 2of3, or 3of4 - choose your vault type. Key generation is fast. No device holds the vault private key.

items.title: Transaction Signing
items.description:
KeySign time: 5 seconds.
One device starts the transaction. A second paired device confirms the transaction. It is natively “two-factor” and must be done in-person.

items.title: Re-sharing
items.description:
Reshare Time: 10 seconds.
Lost a device? Replace it easily without changing the vault. Want to increase security? Go from 2of3 to 3of4 easily.

items.title: Full DeFi
items.description: Swaps, Bridging, DeFi - right from your Vault.

items.title: Remote Signing
items.description: Sign securely with a remote co-signer around the world.

items.title: Transaction Policies
items.description: Nominate spend limits, address whitelists and more.

items.title: WHALES
items.description: If you have more than $100k in crypto, you MUST consider upgrading to a TSS vault. Your funds are at-risk on all other wallets. Download it now.

items.title: FUNDS
items.description: Vultisig is the open-source audited alternative to your current “custodian”. You know it’s time to switch to self-custody. Remote co-signing means you can access funds anywhere in the world.

items.title: TREASURIES
items.description: TSS is natively compatible to all chains. Together with transaction policies, designate your leads the ability to pay staff with limits, whitelists and more.

items.img: Vultisig is the next evolution in crypto vaults

segment-1.title:
UNDERSTAND THE full capabilities of
Vultisig and how it SOLVES crypto security.

segment-2.title:
USE Your Trusted
Devices
segment-2.description:
With Vultisig, you bring your own devices - phone, desktop. laptops or tablets.
Your devices create vaults using their unique keys “vault shares”.

Vault-shares never store funds and can be safely imported/exported anywhere.

Each vault is natively two-factor -- and you can co-sign safely anywhere in the world.

segment-3.title: Asset Management Hub
segment-3.description:
All chains are compatible - Bitcoin, Ethereum, THORChain and even Solana. The first multi-chain multi-asset multi-signature wallet in the world.
You can deposit, send, swap and more inside Vultisig.

segment-4.title: EASY Asset Exchange
segment-4.description:
Vultisig is natively DeFi compatible - rebalance your portfolio right inside the vault.
It also supports advanced DeFi functions such as bonding to Nodes, Lending and Savers.

store.title:
Join many other users who trust Vultisig with their digital assets.
No registration required!

header.title:
THE $VULT
TOKEN
header.text: All swap and bridge fees buy and burn $VULT. Simply hold in your wallet to participate.

faq.q: How do I register for the airdrop?
faq.a:
Become a user and move funds into Vultisig. You can then register some or all of your Vaults.

Note: Airdrop is based on your total vault amounts, multiplied by the length of time your funds are kept in the vault. The largest holders for the longest amount of time earn the most.

faq.q: What assets are counted for the Airdrop?
faq.a:
Any supported Layer1 or Layer2 asset, and any token on the 1inch token list.

You can register as many vaults as you wish.

The first Airdrop period goes for 12 months - it is 10% of the Supply of $VULT.

Then there is an annual airdrop of 2% of the supply for 5 years. A total of 20% will be airdropped.

items.q: How do I set up my crypto vault?
items.a: Get 2 or more of your devices together and connected to your local WiFi, Hotspot or internet. Then simply pair them via QR code and create a new vault. You can then send funds in.

items.q: What cryptocurrencies are supported by Vultisig?
items.a: All assets supported by Trust Wallet Core are supported in Vultisig.

items.q: How does the crypto vault app secure my cryptocurrencies?
items.a: Vultisig is audited, open-source and uses a very well-proven TSS libarary.
Vultisig only charges a flat fee on swap and bridging. There are no other hidden fees.

items.q: Can I recover my assets if I lose a device?
items.a: You can back-up your vault by exporting the vault shares.
No, there are no registration requirements.
